display_long_description:
Fix it Fast! is a VR game where you have to renovate buildings to pass a technical inspection before they can be sold. You only have a limited time before the technical inspector comes to check the house, so you have to be fast fixing any problems that you could find. You can use multiple tools for the task, and maybe a quick fix is better than a proper one due to the time constraints. Anything to pass the inspection in time! But will your fixes hold up long enough? 

Features
 - Any tool can be used to attempt to solve any problem in the house, with different results. It is up to the player to discover what works best.
- Lots of objects found in the houses can be interacted with. Some of them will be useful, some others won’t.
- Quick and dirty fix vs proper fix: a time management choice. Proper fixes take more time but hold up longer. Quick and dirty fixes risk reappearing during inspection.
- Check the time you have left by looking at your watch on your wrist. Your timer at a glance, like in real life.
- All the tools are applied using realistic hand gestures. This is a made-for- VR game so the goal is to get as immersive as possible.
